wikipedia_page.main: Harry Louis Bernstein (May 30, 1910 – June 3, 2011) was a British-born American writer. Bernstein lived in Brick Township, New Jersey.  He died at the age of 101, on June 3, 2011.

response: *1910 – Harry Bernstein, English-American journalist and author (d. 2011)

* Harry Bernstein (1910–2011), author of The Invisible Wall.Rich, Motoko. "Successful at 96, Writer Has More to Say", The New York Times, April 7, 2007. Accessed March 15, 2012. "Harry Bernstein at his home in Brick, NJ."
*  The Invisible Wall: A Love Story That Broke Barriers by Harry Bernstein
